data.prayer: Father, help the 13,605 believers in Srinagar to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Srinagar, Jammu and Kashmir, India
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Please, teach the 13,605 believers in Srinagar, Jammu and Kashmir, India how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the county of Srinagar.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Srinagar, Jammu and Kashmir, India.
Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Kavoj people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Kavoj people.
Spirit, please defend the 13,605 believers in Srinagar against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.
Father, see the suffering of your people in the county of Srinagar. Deliver all those who have not forgotten your Word.
data.verse: Look on my suffering and deliver me, for I have not forgotten your law.

data.prayer: Father, for those in trouble in the county of Srinagar prompt them to call on you for rescue today.
data.verse: He will call on me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him and honor him.

location.name: Srinagar
location.people_groups_list: Budhan (Muslim traditions), Budhan (Hindu traditions), Shakhsaz, Beda, Rajput Awan
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Budhan (Muslim traditions) (2,800), Budhan (Hindu traditions) (100), Shakhsaz (2,700), Beda (600), Rajput Awan (11,000)
